name: Damn Humans
description:
Story

it was a normal day, everything was going as planned until.. an asteroid full of humans crashed into a "peacefull" alien planet, wreking havoc everywere. But an angry alien called Peto decided that was it, and armed with the All-Gun embraced the duty to kill all humans.

The All-Gun A wepone to rule them all, Everything that can harm a human in one simple to use gun for the resonable price of  500& you can have one for yourself.  Note to unlock more wepons you must buy the dlc's wich come at a cost of 2000 human livers Work Donald The best intergalatic  fast food restaurant is here to feed you with the best meat of the universe, this meat is recaved by a far away planet called earth, making it super expensive to get. that's why we mix it with 99% of alien meat making the earth meat compleatly useless The Broken Bean an incredible piece of modern art, it's shape and it's beauty resembles the shape of a bean when with your dirty sandals you squish it down to the ground, This piece of art is not to be confused with the one in the terrestrial city of chicago, that's just a dirty imitation.

Thank you for playing my game. all art has been made by me, feel free to use it by crediting!

WARNING THE GAME DOESN'T WORK ON MAC
